text.172_Daf, 17_Line: It is written “On your walls, O Jerusalem, I have appointed watchmen; all day and all night, they shall never be silent; those who remind the Lord, be not silent.” (Isaiah 62:6) What do they say?  This is what Raba bar Rav Shilah said:  “You will rise, You will have mercy on Zion…” (Psalms 102:14)
text.172_Daf, 18_Line: R’ Nachman bar Yitzchak said: “The Lord is the builder of Jerusalem…” (Psalms 147:2)  And from the beginning (before the destruction) what would they say?  Raba bar Rav Shilah said:  “For the Lord has chosen Zion; He desired it for His habitation.” (Psalms 132:13)
